body_html:
This is intended. For environment in run_config, 'local' means not distributed. We probably should document this better.

For distributed training, environment should be set as 'cloud' in the TF_CONFIG. This covers the cases that all nodes in the cluster are localhost process. From implementation perspective, it is hard to define "local distributed" precisely.

Hope this clarifies.

This is intended. For environment in run_config,  'local' means not distributed. We probably should document this better. 

For distributed training, environment should be set as 'cloud' in the TF_CONFIG. This covers the cases that all nodes in the cluster are localhost process. From implementation perspective, it is hard to define "local distributed" precisely. 

Hope this clarifies.
